overview:
Yaniv Ben Efraim is an American investor and mobile media expert.

Previously the Chief Executive Officer of the B.E. Group, Ben Efraim is a renowned businessman with notable activities in the areas of technology, finance, and syndication.

His relevant background includes: Investments, web development, monetization, co-branding, Cellular Web, & User Experience. Yaniv was educated at Northwestern University, and Holds an Executive Master of Business Administration degree from the Kellogg School of Management.
